topic.title: Back And Spine Assessment - conformance rules

lines.i: Qualitative assessment of condition of patient's back and spine

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.119"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11238)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10394)/@code="67532-2" Physical findings of Back+Spine NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10393)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11239)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10397), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet BackSpineAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.34 DYNAMIC (CONF:10398)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:10396), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet BackSpineFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.35 DYNAMIC (CONF:10395)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.13
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11238)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10394)/@code="67532-2" Physical findings of Back+Spine NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10393)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11239)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10397), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet BackSpineAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.34 DYNAMIC (CONF:10398)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:10396), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet BackSpineFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.35 DYNAMIC (CONF:10395)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.13
